Rattrap:




"Yeah, right!" Rattrap kept running, as fast as his short rat legs 
could carry him. His body jolted his his movements, with a bouncy 
gait. "Get away ya buzzard!" He kept his ears pinned to the side of 
his skull. He squealed.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> :GoldenEye::
> 
> She flew after him. This is fun, she thought.  she followed him 
> staying about 15 feet off the ground. "Hey, wait up. I'm not going 
to 
> hurt you. Awww, come on, wait up."  She flew and followed him.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Rattrap:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Rattrap heard a female voice near-by, and turned his head. He saw 
a 
> > raptor (bird of prey, not the dinosaur.)perched on a branch. He 
> > pinned his ears, and screamed. His black beady eyes went wide. He 
> > went to fours and bolted. 
> > 
> > "Get away from me!" he yelled.
